short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Better Github Image Diff Chromium/Firefox extension improves the image diff experience on GitHub `Files Changed` view.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Github image diff provides 2-up, swipe and onion skin option. This extension adds more view options to highlight differences between photos of identical size - particularly useful to compare screenshots. Supports .jpg and .png images.
